trait.name: Resiliència Nana

trait.name: Indomable (2/Dia)
entries: Ahmaergo can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

trait.name: Recuperar l'Alè (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció bonus, Ahmaergo can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Extra Damage
entries: If Ahmaergo has more than half his hit points remaining he deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany tallant on every hit.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Ahmaergo fa tres atacs with his greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) de dany tallant

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Ammalia és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

items.name: Control d'Aigua
entries: At will, Avi can control the flow and shape of water in a 5-foot cube, or cause the water to freeze for up to 1 hour.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The rat has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Barnibus és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics) He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Barnibus carries a {@item wand of magic detection}. (spell included in spell list below but does not use a slot when cast from the wand)

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Bepis can move through a space occupied by a creature of a size larger than him

trait.name: Coratge
entries: Bepis has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition acovardit}.

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: On each of her turns, the Black Viper pot Córrer, Destravar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If the Black Viper is subjected to an effect that allows her salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: The Black Viper deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Black Viper that isn't {@condition incapacitat} and the Black Viper doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Black Viper fa tres atacs with her rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Esquivar l'Impossible
entries: The Black Viper halves the damage that she takes from an attack that hits her. She must be able to see the attacker.

items.name: Encegat
entries: The troll is wearing an eyeless helm, i està {@condition encegat}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Davil és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 12. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics) He has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Davil té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition fascinat} i no pot patir son màgicament

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. O Atac Armat a Distància: {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Bec

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Tot equipament que duu o vesteix no es transforma. Retorna a la seva forma veritable si mor.

trait.name: Adhesive (Només en forma d'objecte)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it ({@dc 13} per escapar). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença (Només en forma d'objecte)
entries: Quan the mimic es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un object ordinary.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mimic can make three attacks; two with its pseudòpodes and one with its bite

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany d'àcid.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The drow's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 12} salvació de conjur) Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, and the drow no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Gunslinger
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the drow's ranged attack rolls with a pistol. A més, the drow ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the drow té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as on Saviesa (Percepció) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Poisonous Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 30/90 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Durnan wields a {@item Greatsword of Sharpness||sword of sharpness (greatsword)} called Grimvault. He wears {@item botes de gambades i saltirons}, {@item elven chain}, and a {@item ring of spell turning}.

trait.name: Indomable (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: Durnan can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: While wearing his ring of spell turning, Durnan has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only him (not in an area of effect). If Durnan rolls a 20 for the save and the spell is 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on him and instead targets the caster, using the slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and habilitat de llançament de conjurs of the caster.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Durnan makes four atacs armats cos a cos.

action.name: Grimvault
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the target is an object, the hit instead deals 16 slashing damage. If the target is a creature and Durnan rolls a 20 on the {@dice d20} for the attack roll, the target takes an extra 14 slashing damage, and Durnan rolls another {@dice d20}. On a roll of 20, he lops off one of the target's limbs, or some other part of its body if it is limbless.

action.name: Double Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Falsa Aparença

action.name: Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) de dany perforant while mounted.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. O Atac Armat a Distància: {@hit 4} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Descens de Ploma

headerEntries: Hlam és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics) He has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If Hlam is subjected to an effect that allows him salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Magic Attacks

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Hlam is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac

action.name: Atac Desarmat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@dice 1d10 + 7}) bludgeoning, magic damage. If the target is a creature, Hlam can choose one of the following additional effects:
The target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 18} or drop one item it is holding (Hlam's choice).
The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.
The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} or be {@condition atordit} until the end of Hlam's next turn.

action.name: Dard
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Quivering Palm {@recharge}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Si falla, the target is reduced to 0 hit points. Si supera, the target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Cos Complet (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a atac armat a distància, Hlam deflects the missile. The damage he takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 27}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Hlam catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and he has a hand free.

reaction.name: Caiguda Lenta
entries: Hlam reduces the dany contundent he takes from a fall by 100.

legendary.name: Quick Step
entries: Hlam moves up to his speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

legendary.name: Atac Desarmat (Costa 2 Accions)

legendary.name: Invisibility (Costa 3 Accions)

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. O Atac Armat a Distància: {@hit 4} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

entries: Jarlaxle wears {@item +3 armadura de cuir}, a {@item hat of disguise}, a {@item bracer of flying daggers|wdh}, a {@item cloak of invisibility}, a {@item knave's eye patch|wdh}, and a {@item ring of truth telling|wdh}. He wields a {@item +3 rapier} and carries a {@item portable hole} and a {@item wand of web}. His hat is adorned with a {@item feather of diatryma summoning|wdh}.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

entries: Quan the gargoyle es manté immòbil, és indistingible d'un inanimate statue .

entries: Laeral wears a white {@item robe of the archmagi} (accounted for in her statistics). She wields a {@item flame tongue longsword}.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: While wearing her robe of the archmagi, Laeral té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Laeral fa tres atacs with her silver hair and flame tongue, in any combination. She can cast one of her cantrips or 1st-level spells before or after making these attacks.

action.name: Silver Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de força, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 19} o estar {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Flame Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc, o 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc si s'usa amb dos mans.

action.name: Spellfire (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: Magical, heatless, silver fire harmlessly erupts from Laeral and surrounds her until she is {@condition incapacitat} or until she uses an action to quench it. She gains one of the following benefits of her choice, which lasts until the silver fire ends:

items: She can survive without food and water.
She is immune to magic that would ascertain her thoughts, truthfulness, alignment, or creature type.
She gains resistance to cold damage, and she is unharmed by temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit.

entries: While the silver fire is present, she has the following additional action options:

items: Cast the {@spell curar ferides} spell. The target regains {@dice 1d8 + 5} hit points. After Laeral takes this action, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1, the silver fire disappears.
Cast the {@spell revifar} spell without material components. After Laeral takes this action, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1-2, the silver fire disappears.

Release a 60-foot line of silver fire that is 5 feet wide or a 30-foot cone of silver fire. Objects in the area que ningú estigui portant o vestint take 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany de foc. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21}. Qui falli rep 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. After Laeral takes this action, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1-3, the silver fire disappears.

A restabliment menor spell or similar magic ends the effect.

action.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)

The summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

entries: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 0 peus d'abast, un objectiu in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant, o 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany perforant if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Respirar sota l'aigua
entries: Sylgar can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Tally té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition fascinat} i no pot patir son màgicament

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Indomable (2/Dia)
entries: Tashlyn can reroll a saving throw that she fails. She must use the new roll.

trait.name: Recuperar l'Alè (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció bonus, Tashlyn can regain 20 hit points.

trait.name: Extra Damage
entries: Tashlyn deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to every hit if she has more than half her hit points remaining.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Tashlyn fa tres atacs with her greatsword or her shortbow.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Resiliència Nana
entries: Thorvin has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, Thrakkus can gain advantage on all atac armat cos a cos rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Breath Weapon (1/Dia)
entries: Thrakkus can use his action to exhale a 15-foot cone of fire. Tota criatura a dins del con ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 6 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Tissina's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma. Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Tissina és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa. Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: Tissina té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition fascinat} o {@condition acovardit}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Tissina fa dos atacs armats cos a cos.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. O Atac Armat a Distància: {@hit 4} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Urstul has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Urstul scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If Urstul is subjected to an effect that allows him salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, Urstul instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: En Urstul fa 14 ({@dice 4d6}) extra de dany quan impacta amb un atac armat i: o bé té avantatge a impactar, o bé l'objectiu té un aliat d'en Urstul a 5 peus que no està {@condition incapacitat} i l'atacant no té desavantatge a impactar.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Urstul makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 24 ({@damage 7d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Vajra is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Vajra wields the {@item Blackstaff|wdh}, accounted for in her statistics. Roll {@dice 2d10} to determine how many charges the staff has remaining.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Vajra té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Staff Spells
entries: While holding the blackstaff, Vajra can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using her spell save DC and spell attack bonus: {@spell con de fred} (5 charges), {@spell bola de foc} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell globus d'invulnerabilitat} (6 charges), {@spell immobilitzar criatura} (5 charges), {@spell levitar} (2 charges), {@spell lightning bolt} (5th-level version, 5 charges), {@spell missil màgic} (1 charge), {@spell raig d'afebliment} (1 charge), or {@spell paret de força} (5 charges).

action.name: Blackstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning, magic damage, o 6 ({@dice 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning, magic damage si s'usa amb dos mans. Vajra can expend 1 of the staff's charges to deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de força on a hit.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Valetta és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa. Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Divine Eminence
entries: Com a acció bonus, Valetta can expend a spell slot to cause her atacs armats cos a cos to magically deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany radiant to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts fins el final del torn. If Valetta expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, el dany extra incrementa en {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

action.name: Breathe Weapon
entries: Valetta can use her action to exhale a 5-foot-wide, 30-foot line of lightning (but can't do this again until she finishes a short or long rest); tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 11}, taking {@dice 2d6} de dany elèctric; si supera, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Victoro és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 15. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

spells: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Victoro wears a {@item ring of protection} and {@item glamoured studded leather} disguised to look like fine clothing. He carries a {@item rod of rulership} shaped like a ruby-tipped cane.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Victoro té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition fascinat} i no pot patir son màgicament

trait.name: Rod of Rulership
entries: Victoro can use an action to present the rod and command obedience from each creature of his choice that he can see within 120 feet of him. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition fascinat} for 8 hours by Victoro. While {@condition fascinat} in this way, the creature regards Victoro as its trusted leader. If harmed by Victoro or his companions, or commanded to do something contrary to its nature, a target ceases to be {@condition fascinat} in this way. The rod no es pot tornar a utilitzar fins el proper trenc d'alba.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Victoro fa dos atacs with his rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cloak of Shadows (2/Dia)
entries: Victoro becomes {@condition invisible} until the end of his next turn. He becomes visible early immediately after he attacks or casts a spell.

action.name: Summon Devil (Recharges after 9 Days)
entries: Victoro summons a {@creature barbed devil}. The devil apareix en un espai desocupat within 30 feet of Victoro, acts as Victoro's ally, and can't summon other devils. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Victoro dies, or until Victoro dismisses it as an action.

immune.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

trait.name: Crumbling Colossus
entries: When the statue es queda a 0 punts de vida, it crumbles and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of the crumbling statue ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 22}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany contundent; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The statue és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The statue té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The statue fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The statue fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Hurled Stone
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 200/800 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}43 ({@damage 6d10 + 10}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Xanathar wears a {@item ring of invisibility}, a {@item ring of mind shielding}, and a {@item ring of force resistència||ring of resistance (force)}.

trait.name: Implacable Endurance
entries: When reduced to 0 hit points, Yagra drops to 1 hit point instead (but can't do this again until she finishes a long rest).

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: Yagra has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

trait.name: Atac Despietat
entries: When she scores a critical hit Yagra can roll one of the weapon's damage dice and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Yagra fa dos atacs armats cos a cos.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Yalah adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Yalah must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The thug té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de thug's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Implacable Endurance (1/Dia)
entries: When reduced to 0 hit points Yorn drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The thug fa dos atacs cos a cos.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: The adept can move through the space of a medium of larger creature.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: The adept has advantage on any saving throws against being {@condition acovardit}.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, their AC includes their Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The adept makes three atacs desarmats or three dart attacks.

action.name: Atac Desarmat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:

items: The target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or drop one item it is holding (adept's choice).
The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.
The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition atordit} until the end of the adept's next turn.

action.name: Dard
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a atac armat a distància, the adept deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 3}. If the damage is reduced to 0, the adept catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the adept has a hand free.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Ziraj és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma. Té els següents conjurs de paladí preparats:

spells: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Ziraj fa tres atacs with his glaive or with his oversized longbow.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Oversized Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Dreadful Aspect (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Ziraj exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of him ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition acovardit} for 1 minute of Ziraj. If a {@condition acovardit} enemy ends its turn more than 30 feet away from Ziraj, the enemy can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
